title: CISA Issues Alert on Samsung 0-Day RCE Flaw Actively Exploited in Attacks

content.raw: The Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) has added a critical remote code execution vulnerability affecting Samsung mobile devices to its Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) catalog, signaling active exploitation in the wild. Tracked as CVE-2025-21042, this zero-day flaw resides in Samsung’s libimagecodec library. It could allow attackers to bypass security protections and execute arbitrary code […] The post CISA Issues Alert on Samsung 0-Day RCE Flaw Actively Exploited in Attacks appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
